Action.author: jtclark
Action.body: Had a conversation with ~rameshthoomu on how to modify the fabric-byfn-verify and fabric-byfn-merge to pull the images from the nexus repository instead of running the builds.

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: This change has been merged in fabric-samples. https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/22443/
